other_title: Ai Tenshi Densetsu Wedding Peach DX (Japanese)
愛天使伝説ウェディング・ピーチDX (Japanese)
plot: The battle between the angels and devils has ended, and Momoko, Lily, Hinagiku, and Scarlet have had their memories erased to give them normal lives as high school girls. The girls enjoy their lives living alongside their sweethearts, but it appears not all is peaceful yet. When Momoko is attacked by a devil, Goddess Aphrodite is forced to return the memories of the Love Angels so they can protect the world once more.
